Membership Programs

Customize Your Membership

As a Best Western Rewards Member, you can add special rewards programs from our partners to your account.

  • AAA Program

    The AAA program includes all Best Western Rewards Program benefits* based on membership level. In addition you'll receive:

    • A discount of 10% or more on room rates at Best Western hotels with the AAA member discount.
    • An automatic upgrade to Gold Elite status as an AAA program member.

    LEARN MORE
